title: Seriemorderen i Orkdal
overview: Jens Christian Nørve and Asbjørn Hansen shed new light on one of the most sensational murder cases in Norwegian history. In 1983, Arnfinn Nesset was convicted of killing 22 elderly people at the retirement home and nursing home. The killing method was to put syringes with the poison Curacit. Nesset initially admitted to killing 25 people, but later withdrew the confession.
